data.message:
hi, i been trying for email to support team, but i couldn't get any response from the team. do u mind to help me?
my ad account has been flagged for policy violations, which i don know why this is happened on myself.
i used my own credit card for the payment.
pls check for me.....
thx ya

replies.message: Hi Winni. If your advertising account has been disabled for suspicious activity, you can submit your information here: http://bit.ly/2pCVgG4. Due to high volume, the wait time for disabled account appeals is longer than expected. The team will reach out to you as soon as they can. -Jessica
